author: Simple History
description:
Spain’s Golden Age was fueled by New World treasure — but that same gold led to its collapse. Discover how endless wealth brought debt, decline, and the fall of a once-mighty empire.

This video was made possible thanks to everyone on the Simple History Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/simplehistory

Check out our other Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPdc6bs3I8s6Y4QE_3g3MZw

title: How American Gold DESTROYED The Spanish Empire
